programme.title: MXP: Most Xtreme Primate
programme.desc: After an exciting career playing professional hockey and busting tricks with the world’s best skateboarders, Jack is back at the El Simian nature preserve. Jack likes hanging around but soon he grows tired of life at the preserve. Trying to liven things up, Julie, the caretaker, organizes a family vacation to Mexico. But then, Jack gets separated from the group and ends up on the wrong plane to Colorado!! Lost and confused, Jack meets up with Pete, a snowboarder, and his rocker brother Jay, who try to help Jack find his family.

programme.title: Walk of Shame
programme.desc: After losing an audition for her dream job, Meghan Miles, a Los Angeles TV news anchor, goes out for an uncharacteristic night of partying. She awakes in a stranger’s bed to a phone message announcing the job is hers, if she can make it to the news station by time of broadcast. Stranded in an unknown area without money, a phone, and a car, Meghan — clad in a provocative yellow dress — embarks on a series of misadventures. As she races to the most important job interview of her life, she finds herself among drug dealers and hookers — all while being pursued by the LAPD, an angry taxi driver, and a young kid with an attitude.

programme.title: Frat Pack
programme.desc: A shy British graduate gets dragged on a wild road trip across America to a fraternity party by his soon-to-be stepbrothers, as his mother marries into a larger-than-life, American family. This raucous and wild comedy from Michael Philip (Drop Dead Sexy, Van Wilder 2, Timber Falls) stars Danny Trejo (Machete), Melissa Bolona (Acts of Violence, The Hurricane Heist) and Hana Mae Lee (Pitch Perfect).

programme.title: My Art
programme.desc: Ellie Shine (Laurie Simmons) is a single artist living in New York City. Ellie has a good life: a stable teaching job, successful friends, and a loyal, aging dog named Bing. As her decades-old dream of a respectable place in the art world becomes more elusive, her frustration with her lack of recognition feels alarmingly urgent. When she is offered the summer house and studio of a famous friend she seizes the opportunity to hit the reset button on her life and work. She unwittingly finds inspiration in two out-of-work actors who maintain the gardens at her summer retreat.

programme.title: Entanglement
programme.desc: Entanglement' is a charmingly quirky romantic comedy with a twist! While searching for the meaning of his existence, Ben Layton (Thomas Middleditch: 'Silicon Valley') uncovers a family secret that leads him to a woman named Hanna (Jess Weixler: 'The Good Wife') who might have almost been his adopted sister. But when he and Hanna inadvertently fall in love, and his life becomes increasingly and weirdly complicated, Ben starts to realise that everything is incredibly connected and love may give him a new lease on life.

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: UAE Warriors 9

The 15-fight card is headlined by a lightweight bout between UFC veterans Dan Moret and Anton Kuivanen. In the co-headliner, Steven Kennedy faces Tarek Suleiman. In the lightweight division, undefeated Russian Usman Nurmagomedov has been matched with Ukraine’s Roman Golovinov. Meanwhile in the middleweight division ONE Championship alumni Bakhtiyar Abbasov has been matched with Igor Litoshik and Ahmad Labban faces Magomedsultan Magomedsultanov.

programme.title: Black September: Munich Olympics 1972
programme.desc: At dawn, on the 11th day of the XX Olympic Games in Munich, in 1972, 8 Palestinians of the terrorist group Black September climb over the fence surrounding the Olympic village. They head towards the Israeli team’s quarter. What happens thereafter is history: eleven Israeli athletes, one German policeman and five terrorists die in a bloodbath. The Munich massacre not only shocks the whole world but also launches a new era of international terrorism. This intense and gripping film provides entirely new perspectives and insights into this traumatizing event with never-before-seen footage of the victims and of the negotiations with the terrorists.

programme.title: Karun
programme.desc: Karun: Misadventures On Iran’s Longest River' - British adventurers Tom Allen and Leon McCarron set out to follow Iran’s longest river, the Karun, by human powered means. Their aim is to go beyond the politics and explore the culture and geography of this most misunderstood of nations and have a great adventure doing so. But despite Tom’s previous experience of travel in Iran, they find that cultural differences run deeper than they’d realised.

programme.title: Aina
programme.desc: ‘ĀINA: That Which Feeds Us’ – The best-kept secret on Kaua`i isn’t a secluded beach or local surf spot, it’s that four of the world’s largest chemical companies are using the island as an open-air testing ground for pesticides on genetically modified crops. Winner Accolades Global Film Competition.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Quinoa
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: Wadjemup : Black Prison White Playground
programme.desc: Black Prison White Playground. Wadjemup/Rottnest Island. A beautiful place that is culturally and spiritually significant to Aboriginal people. And also a site where gross harm took place and hundreds of Aboriginal men are buried in unmarked graves.

programme.title: Letters to our Children: Stories of Refuge
programme.desc: A group of immigrant and refugee mothers from 10 different countries and speaking different languages create a book of illustrations showcasing heartfelt letters to their children as a way to explain what brought them to Winnipeg, Canada and what they hope their lives will be like. This film follows the women’s incredible journey as they find a way to pass their stories to their children.

programme.title: Amazonas
programme.desc: Numerous climatic, political and civilising changes have a great impact on the settlements in the central Amazon area. Step by step the local people develop their own mentality regarding a sustainable and well-adapted life in the heart of the Amazon rain forests. In 2012, the film maker Thomas Miklautsch from Carinthia, together with his assistant Anja Krois, set off to travel for several months along the Amazon, from the Columbian Leticia to Rio Ampiyaco near Iquitos in Peru, always in harmony

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Uprooting (Episode 3)
programme.desc: After the initial games, the First Eleven is established where the next generation of footballers may end up playing a crucial role for BVB. While Giovanni Reyna has already had a breakthrough into the pro team, the even younger Youssoufa Moukoko works on his debut. How do these two exceptional teenagers cope with the challenges of being in the public eye from a young early? This episode takes a close look into the challenges of talent promotion and social responsibility.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: The Greed for Success (Episode 4)
programme.desc: When Erling Haaland signed with BVB it created a huge media stir. A year on, he is due a review of his outstanding first and record-breaking year at Dortmund. However, for Haaland, there has been more to this last year than just being on the pitch, such as, how has he grown as a player and a person? How do friends, companions and his father perceive his development? Is there any unnoticed potential concerning his career? Narrated by Haaland himself along with his closest advisor, his father, Alfie, this episode is a truly personal story.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Never forget (Episode 5)
programme.desc: In January, focus is on commemorating the atrocities committed by the Nazis. BVB is doing commemorative work and wants to preserve this for future generations. The episode is set in the former Auschwitz concentration camp in present-day Poland. Holocaust survivor Eva Szepesi and others share their stories, contributing to the importance of remembering these events and emphasising the social responsibility of football.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Real Love (Episode 6)
programme.desc: “Echte liebe”. A brand claim or much more? Mats Hummels talks about the old and new times at Dortmund. Norbert Dickel meets Dede, and Jürgen Klopp remembers an almost perfect championship team. In addition, former talent Dario Scuderi tells his incredible story that will forever connect him to BVB.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Ride Your Dream

Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Killer in the Caves
programme.desc: About 6.5 million bats have died in the last six years in North America. A disease is driving the Little Brown Bats to extinction and causes mass mortalities among other bat species. The epidemic is still a riddle, but bat-experts piece together information like criminal investigators. The ingenuity of the scientists is captured through astonishing experiments and groundbreaking technology in an effort to understand this mysterious disease and learn more about this common yet unknown animal.

Suzannah Lipscomb, explora la compleja historia de amor de Nicholas y Alexandra y el papel de la pareja en el período previo a la Revolución Rusa que llevó a su ejecuciones trágicas.

programme.title: Aliens: Are We Alone?
programme.desc: Does alien life exist out there in the Universe? Scientists are now getting closer than ever to answering that question thanks to the Kepler Space Telescope. This revolutionary spacecraft is on a mission to find habitable alien planets. Thanks to Kepler, we now know of thousands of possible planets and we’re getting closer than ever to finding the holy grail: a twin of our Earth. We use CGI to bring these alien worlds to life, and with the help of scientists, we speculate on what extra-terrestrial life might be like.

programme.title: James Bond: For Our Eyes Only
programme.desc: In 1953, James Bond first emerged as a character in Ian Fleming's novel ‘Casino Royale’, and just nine years later the spy was the protagonist in the film ‘Dr. No’ – thus starting one of the longest and most successful franchises in the history of cinema. Beautiful women, exhilarating stunts, breath-taking locales and the charm of a handsome English secret agent have formed the essential ingredients of all Bond films. Recount and relive all of 007’s menacing missions, from the first feature film production in 1962 to the highly anticipated ‘No Time To Die’.

programme.title: The Bay Games

programme.title: Waking The Titanic
programme.desc: Waking the Titanic is something special, a living history told on a small, but no less poignant human scale. Through stylised re-enactments, the docudrama recreates the story of the Addergoole 14 and what happened to them on the Titanic. The story is told using detailed accounts handed down to family members from the people of the time and interviews with the descendents of 3 who survived.

The Dinosaur Echo is directed, written and produced by Canadian filmmaker Brandy Yanchyk.

programme.title: The Missing Tourist
programme.desc: On October 17, 2014, Atsumi Yoshikubo travelled to Canada’s remote Northwest Territories from Japan with the hope of seeing the Aurora Borealis. Five days after she arrived, she went walking along the main road heading out of town and was never seen again. The Missing Tourist traces the investigation from southern Japan to the wilderness of the Canadian north, breaking down cultural boundaries to bring closure to this unsettling mystery.

What is it to be a Duke in the 21st Century?

Forsaken by the local townspeople, advised by Sheriff Wingate (Dale Wilson) to leave town, Lillian decides instead to take a stand against her sociopathic stalker, and enlists the help of an ex-logger Lester (Sir Anthony Hopkins) and his laconic young sidekick Nate (Alexander Ludwig), the only two men in town brave enough, or crazy enough, to go with her, and go up against Blackway.

programme.title: The Sea Wolf Eps 2 of 2
programme.desc: The Sea Wolf is an engrossing psychological thriller based on the best-selling novel by Jack London. Tyrannical, brutal and notorious, Captain Wolf Larsen, AKA the infamous Sea Wolf (Sebastian Koch: Bridge of Spies) rules the crew of his seal-hunting schooner with an iron fist. A unique high-seas adventure that will stir, inspire, and excite like never before.

programme.title: Nothing But the Truth
programme.desc: A edge-of-your-seat political thriller starring Kate Beckinsale (Love & Friendship), Vera Farmiga (The Conjuring) and Matt Dillon (Crash). Washington DC political journalist Rachel Armstrong writes an explosive story about a government scandal revealing the name of a covert CIA agent. When a special government prosecutor demands she divulge her source, she refuses and struggles to defend herself.

programme.title: Into The White
programme.desc: The exceptional tale of when war took a back seat. Starring Rupert Grint (Harry Potter franchise), this heart-stopping, dramatic thriller is inspired by true events. Stranded in the wilderness of Norway after an aircraft battle, a group of German pilots reach an abandoned cabin. Followed shortly, by two British pilots. Now sheltering together for survival, will the soldiers put their enmity aside?

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Gladiator meets Game of Thrones in this electrifying epic starring Academy Award winner Morgan Freeman and Academy Award nominee Clive Owen. In an age of honour and justice by the sword Raiden is a fallen warrior who must rise up against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge Bartok, his dishonoured master.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A spectacular fantasy-epic, recounting the legendary adventures of two iconic characters. In Dark Ages Britain, a time of myth and magic, a Saxon force from the East attacks the Celtic people. However, hope is not lost when Arthur, a banished warrior, and Merlin, a hermit wizard, embark on a heroic quest to save their people. A mystic and mythical tale of courage and valour.

programme.title: Raindrop - Season 1 - Dirty face
programme.desc: Raindrop is a drop of water. You can find it in the forest, in the river, in the sea and even in your house. Surrounded by her friends Vaporón (a cloud) and Frigote (a cube of ice), she will live many adventures and defeat a germ, the evil bacteria, in her attempt to destroy the environment.

Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.desc: Swing | Slide | Bycicle | Pram | Baby | Camel | Cookie | Fox | Jam | Parrot Five characters, accompanied by their inseparable vehicle-gadget, sets out on a journey where the main purpose is to eat, one by one, the delicious round pastries scattered around the garden.

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: Black or White is the story of a grandfather who is suddenly left to care for his beloved granddaughter. When her paternal grandmother seeks custody with the help of her brother, the little girl is torn between two families who love her deeply. With the best intentions at heart, both families fight for what they feel is right and are soon forced to confront their true feelings about race, forgiveness and understanding. Anchored by an all-star cast and inspired by true events, Black or White is a look at two seemingly different worlds, in which nothing is as simple as black or white.

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: Mo Lundy (Boyd Holbrook) is an innocent man who went to prison for a murder he did not commit. Once freed, Mo looks to put the past behind him by working in a shelter caring for abandoned animals, finding peace in the encouragement from his boss, Linda (Academy Award Winner Octavia Spencer: The Help), and faith in the practice of Islam. However, Mo's tenuous stability is again upended when a desperate and blood-soaked woman, Doris (Elisabeth Moss: TV’s The Handmaid’s Tale) turns up unexpectedly at his work one night.

programme.title: Big Sky
programme.desc: Hazel (Bella Thorne) suffers from a crippling case of agoraphobia. So much so that it causes a rift between her and her mother, Dee (Kyra Sedgwick). Hazel and her mother decide to go on a road trip to a desert facility to help Hazel deal with her fear, but when gunmen and brothers Jesse (Frank Grillo) and Pru (Aaron Tveit) attack them, Hazel has to battle her fears so she and her mother can survive.

programme.title: Parked
programme.desc: After being refused welfare benefits and losing all hope of improving his situation, Fred lives a quiet, isolated life in his car. But everything changes when he forms an unlikely friendship with Cathal, a dope-smoking 21-year-old with a positive attitude, who becomes his ‘neighbour’. Sharing laughs, and the hard times too, Fred and Cathal discover the simple, free pleasures of life. Cathal is determined to make Fred sort his life out, and it works. Fred modifies his car, beats the welfare system and makes a friend in Jules, an attractive music teacher who lives alone nearby.

programme.title: Voice from the Stone
programme.desc: A haunting horror thriller set in an isolated castle in 1950s Tuscany, Voice From the Stone tells the story of Verena (Emilia Clarke: TV’s Game of Thrones, Me Before You), a determined young nurse who is hired to aid a boy through the trauma of his mother's sudden death. As she works with the troubled boy, she falls under the spell of a malevolent force inside the castle.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: They chose the worst man for the job. They expected him to fail, but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. Personal demons put Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard, Anti-Life) a New York City cop at rock bottom. But when he's assigned to escort a petty criminal to testify before the grand jury, a violent turn of events means this down-and-out cop needs to pull it together to save not only the life of the witness but his own as they are hunted across the city. The clock is ticking in this exhilarating race against time. Will justice be served or will there be two more bodies to add to the crime toll of the city?

programme.title: Invasion Planet Earth
programme.desc: After the death of his young daughter, Tom Dunn is a broken man. When his wife falls pregnant again, he cannot believe their luck. However, his joy is short-lived, as, on the very same day, the people of Earth become plagued with terrifying visions of the end of the world. When a gigantic, all-consuming alien mothership appears in the sky and launches a ruthless attack on Earth's cities, chaos and destruction follow. Tom must find the strength and wisdom to save his wife and unborn child. However, first he must confront a shocking truth. A truth which threatens the key to the survival of the human race. The ultimate war for Planet Earth is about to begin...

programme.title: Gutshot Straight
programme.desc: A professional poker player falls deep into the underworld when he takes an unexpected wager from a mysterious high roller. In order to protect himself and his family, he must try and get to the truth as he’s forced into a murder plot making him the prime target for revenge. This action thriller’s star cast includes George Eads (TV's CSI), AnnaLynne McCord (TV's 90210), Steven Seagal (A Good Man, Hard to Kill), Vinnie Jones (Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels, Snatch), Stephen Lang (Avatar), Tia Carrere (Wayne’s World, True Lies) and Ted Levine (American Gangster, Shutter Island).

programme.title: Meet the Firm: Revenge in Rio
programme.desc: On the hunt for the Russian mobsters that murdered their best friend, football hooligans turned career-criminals, Mike and Eddie are led to Brazil where a major drug deal is set to take place under the cover of the World Cup. Looking to hijack the deal and gain the ultimate redemption, the pair become caught between international drug cartels, local thugs and corrupt police.

programme.title: Supercon
programme.desc: A rag-tag group of former TV stars and comic book artists, who make their living working at conventions, decide to steal the loot from a crooked promoter and an overbearing former TV icon.
